website_summaries.verdict: This Coach money clip card case has room for cards and bills, but it's not quite the quality it used to be.
pros: This case is narrow enough to fit inside the pocket of slim fit jeans
May seem stiff in the beginning but gets broken in quickly
cons: Newer Coach customers will be satisfied, but existing customers will notice a slip in quality and that it doesn't hold as much

customer_reviews.title: Don't think it’s actually Coach
customer_reviews.text: Not the same quality as the older model. This is my 3rd Coach wallet/money clip. I have gone through one every 5 years or so. This is definitely not made with the same quality leather. I actually think it’s a knockoff bcuz Coach no longer makes this model
customer_reviews.author: M. Bravin

customer_reviews.title: This is a knock off
customer_reviews.text: I think it is a knock off. I've had several of these wallets through the years and this one is notably different and of poorer quality. The money clip is traditionally made of metal, this one is plastic and it snapped when I put a wad of cash in it.
customer_reviews.author: CDNY

customer_reviews.title: not like coach at
customer_reviews.text: have bought Coach before, this looks very cheap, not like coach at all
customer_reviews.author: peggles

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my fiance for his birthday to replace the one he had for years and fell apart. It's definitely legit Coach, exactly what we were expecting. Will be purchasing again in a few more years when this one is done.
customer_reviews.author: Jaclyn Hakko

customer_reviews.title: Women Can Use This  Coach Money Clip, Too!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this clip to replace my ancient chain wallet. An Amazon review suggested using the clip to attach the case to your waistband. There is a center pocket that holds some bills. It works just fine.
customer_reviews.author: 18in68

customer_reviews.title: Best wallet clip i ever had love how the clip ...
customer_reviews.text: Best wallet clip i ever had love how the clip is leather and not heavy or able to fall out . Coach is top of the line. I ll use one like this forever .
customer_reviews.author: Ricardo Barbella

customer_reviews.title: Good quality fits my stuff
customer_reviews.text: Just what I needed however I found it at the outlet about $20 cheaper.
customer_reviews.author: CEWoz

customer_reviews.title: The product looks pretty nice, is seemingly well-made
customer_reviews.text: The product looks pretty nice, is seemingly well-made, and looks to be the same size as my previous clip. Not sure if it’s because it’s new and needs to stretched, but I can’t get my cards out currently. If that countinues to be an issue I’ll have to switch back to my old one.
customer_reviews.author: becopeland

customer_reviews.title: Money clip is great, not too tightbut money wont fall out
customer_reviews.text: Came as described. Money clip is great, not too tightbut money wont fall out. Leather is nice. Hidden pocket in between fromt and back for extra cash/papers was a plus.
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Hubby loved it. His first designer item! LOL. Takes some time to break in but doesn’t breakdown at all.
customer_reviews.author: Tori

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed in packaging
customer_reviews.text: The product was what I expected however it came in a plastic wrapper not a coach box as it should have. Very very disappointed. For the price it should’ve come with the coach box. It’s embarrassing to give this as a gift!
customer_reviews.author: Wendy Mathews

customer_reviews.title: Coach For Men
customer_reviews.text: Made with quality leather and has enough room for credit cards and bills. I give it a 5 star rating for those reasons.
customer_reviews.author: R. C. Sportsman

customer_reviews.title: Took a very long time to have it delivered. ...
customer_reviews.text: Took a very long time to have it delivered. Uncharacteristic of other Amazon shipments. Also, this is my fourth coach money clip card case and this one is slightly smaller than than the others, making it harder to fit the same number of cards.
customer_reviews.author: Todd DeWitt

customer_reviews.title: Tight
customer_reviews.text: Wallet is tight, doesn't fit a lot but essentials are there. Doesn't hold a lot of cash, coach quality and durability as expected
customer_reviews.author: jason Blu

customer_reviews.title: Great Money Clip
customer_reviews.text: My last Coach money clip lasted 8 years. Definitely worth the price
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: pretty good
customer_reviews.text: right clip works great. does not hold as many cards as I would have liked
customer_reviews.author: nick

customer_reviews.title: Great gift!
customer_reviews.text: Gifted this to my fiancé and he absolutely loved it! Great quality as expected!
customer_reviews.author: Xiomara Burgos

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: brought for nice Christmas Gift I think it should have been in a nice coach box or any box not just in a plastic bag Looked cheap
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Had high expectations. But its okay.
customer_reviews.text: My previous one lasted 12 years! This one seems to have just a touch less material than 12 yrs ago? It works as it should, with the exception of the number of cards. I now have to carry three less cards even after the product had been used daily for three weeks. The clip also is shorter but that does not really matter as it works as a money clip just fine. Just expected same quality and product from a long time ago. As I said It is okay.
customer_reviews.author: R.M.Z.

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Not nearly as much space for cars as my old money clip
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Well built
customer_reviews.text: Quality product, a bit stiff but just needs breaking in I'm sure.
customer_reviews.author: Evan

customer_reviews.title: Birthday gift
customer_reviews.text: It was a gift for my guy Birthday day, he loved it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Decent for the money
customer_reviews.text: It is nice. Only small issue is that it does not hold nearly as many cards as my previous Coach money clip card case. I had to take several cards out and store them.
customer_reviews.author: Scot L. Goldberg

customer_reviews.title: Minimalist female uses this INSTEAD of handbag, wallet, card case.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for myself to further streamline my life. I've been using it about 8 months, clipped onto my pant waistline under my long tunic, it keeps my hands free and removes the shoulder and back strain from carrying a handbag, along with the unnecessary cost and maintenance of a variety of nice color coordinated hand and shoulder bags. I strongly recommend this card case with money clip from Coach. It seems to be the only brand that. Positions the money. clip so that it can function well as a waist clip without risking dropping the cards.
customer_reviews.author: CFoster

product_meta.title: Coach Mens Money Clip Card Case in sport calf leather F75459 Black
product_meta.description: Calf leather Credit card and multifunction pockets Approx. 4" (L) x 2" (H)
